Class CourseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • CourseManager
  • public class CourseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller class to handle most services related to Course objects.

    • Method Detail

      • regStudentToCourse

        public int regStudentToCourse​(Student student,
                              Course course,
                              java.lang.String group,
                              java.lang.String type)
        A method to register Student object into Course, which object both being parsed in.

        In this application, we are storing Student objects inside an ArrayList, which is held by a Session object. This modeling corresponding to having Student records stored under the Session (LEC, TUT, LAB) which the Students attain.

        This method is therefore accessing the Course object's ArrayList of Session and then adding the Student into the corresponding Session.

        Parameters:
        student - Student object to be registered
        course - Course object to add the Student object in
        group - String group ID of the Session we going to register to
        type - Type of Session we are going to register to.
        Returns:
        int 0 if added successfully, -1 if full, -2 if student is inside -3 if group does not exist
        See Also:
        Course.registerStudent(Student, String, String)

      • checkVacancy

        public void checkVacancy​(Course course)
        A method to check the current vacancy of Course object by printing out all Session objects under it and their vacancy. Refer to Course.printSessions() for more info.
        Parameters:
        course - Course object which has vacancy of Sessions to be printed out.

      • printSessionStudent

        public void printSessionStudent​(Course course)
        A method to print out list of Student registered under a Session. This is done by finding the matching Session as described by user and print it out by Session.printSessionStudent() method.
        Parameters:
        course - Course object for Student to be printed out based on Session.

      • getAssessment

        public java.util.ArrayList<Assessment> getAssessment​(Course course)
        A method to return the ArrayList of Assessment components stored under the Course parsed in. This is done by Course.getAssessment() method
        Parameters:
        course - Course object whose list of Assessments is to be returned
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Assessments under the Course.

      • setAssessment

        public void setAssessment​(Course course)
        A method to enter the weightage for Assessment components and relevant data (example exam, coursework, etc). The ArrayList of Assessment (stored in Course object) is append the new component by Course.setAssessment(Assessment)
        Parameters:
        course - Course object which to set up Assessment components for.

      • printCourseStats

        public void printCourseStats​(Course course)
        A method to print out statistics for Course being parsed in. These statistics are for example number of male/female, number of students by year of study and etc.
        Parameters:
        course - Course object to display Statistics for.

      • addSession

        public boolean addSession​(Course course)
                   throws EmptyInputException
        A method to access Course and add more Session into it. This is done by Course.addSession() which append the get related information about the new Session and append it at the end of the ArrayList of Session objects stored under Course object.
        Parameters:
        course - Course object which new Session is to be added to.
        Returns:
        true if success, false if failed.
        Throws:
        EmptyInputException

      • printSessions

        public void printSessions​(Course course)
        A method to access Course object and print out all Session objects stored under it, including their vacancy. This is done by Course.printSessions() method, which traverse the ArrayList of Session stored under Course object and print out the entries.
        Parameters:
        course - Course object whose Session need to be printed out.

      • deregisterStudent

        public int deregisterStudent​(Course course,
                             Student student)
        A method to access Course and remove Student from it. This is done by Course.deregisterStudent(Student) which remove Student from all Session and erase his/her Assessment data.
        Parameters:
        course - Course object which new Session is to be added to.
        student - Student object to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if success, false if failed.

      • printIndexList

        public void printIndexList​(Course course)
        A method to access Course object and print a list of Session objects stored under it. This is done by Course.printIndexList() method, which traverse the ArrayList of Session stored under Course object and print out the entries.
        Parameters:
        course - Course object whose Session need to be printed out.

      • getCourseSession

        public Session getCourseSession​(Course course)
                         throws EmptyInputException
        A method to return a Session object of the parsed in Course.

        This is done by query user for group and type of the Session and use Course.getSession(String, String) to find and return the matching Session. In Course object, the Session object can be found by accessing the ArrayList of Session.

        Parameters:
        course - Course object which we need to get a Session from
        Returns:
        Session object of interest.
        Throws:
        EmptyInputException

      • modifySession

        public void modifySession​(Course course,
                          Session session)
                   throws EmptyInputException,
                          java.util.InputMismatchException
        A method to access a Course object and edit the information of its Session. This is done by getting the input from users and modify via setters and getters, shown in Course.modifySession(Session)
        Parameters:
        course - Course object which have Session to be modified
        session - Session object that is being modified
        Throws:
        EmptyInputException
        java.util.InputMismatchException

      • setResults

        public void setResults​(Course course,
                       Student student)
        A method to enter the result of Student for a particulat Course

        Note that we implemented a Hashmap with Student object being key and the Student's grade as stored data in Assessment. Here we are going to access that data structure to enter the result.

        Firstly, we obtain the ArrayList of Assessment components of Course (for instance, Exam, Coursework and etc). Then we traverse this ArrayList, getting the Assessment object and hence access and modify the HashMap implemented under it via Course.enterResults(Assessment, Student, double)

        Parameters:
        course - Course object where Student's result is to be enter.
        student - Student whose result for Assessment components of a Course need to be stored.

      • printStudentRegistered

        public void printStudentRegistered​(Course course)
        A method to print out all Student objects associated with the parsed in Course object.

        As Student objects are stored in Session objects, which are stored under the Course object, we first traverse the ArrayList of Session, adding all Student objects stored in each entry into a Set.

        We then traverse and print out the Student objects from the Set.

        Parameters:
        course - Course object whose Student objects need to be printed out.
        See Also:
        ArrayList, Set
